DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the dental status of children using ritalin and suffering from ADHA in comparison to healthy children.
DOC.brief_title: Oral Status and Prevalence of Dental Trauma in Children Treated With Ritalin Due to Attention-Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD)
DOC.detailed_description: In this trial oral and dental status of 30 children (ages 5-12) who suffer from ADHD and treated with ritalin will be evaluated. Parameters that will be checked are the following: DMFT - decay, missing, filling teeth for dental status, GI - gingival index, PI - plaque index for periodontal status. OJ - over jet and OB - over bite for inter-maxillary relations and susceptibility for dental trauma. In addition these parameters will be collected for 30 age and sex match healthy children.
DOC.criteria: children ages 512 years healthy children children taking ritalin who suffer from ADHD all others
